author: jbellis
msg: add actual dropped check to Memtable.flush for CASSANDRA-2381

author: markt
msg: Move the processor.recycle calls to just before the point where the processor is returned to the pool. This ensures returned processors are recycled (this could have been skipped on some exception paths)
This is part of the fix for CVE-2011-1475

author: psteitz
msg: Changed jar name to include version number (take two).

author: markt
msg: Always recycle unless it is an async request.
